SEARCH
Package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.simple

Interface EventServiceProvider.Factory<K,E,O>

Type Parameters:
K - the key type
E - the event type
O - the order type
Enclosing interface:
EventServiceProvider<K,E,O>
public static interface EventServiceProvider.Factory<K,E,O>
A factory interface to create EventServiceProvider.

The implementation of this interface is immutable, so all factory methods creates a new instance of EventServiceProvider.Factory.

  • Method Summary

    • orderComparator

      @Contract("_, _ -> new") @NotNull <O1> @NotNull EventServiceProvider.Factory<K,E,O1> orderComparator(Comparator<? super O1> orderComparator, O1 defaultOrder)
      Sets the Comparator and the default order.

      The default order is used when the order is not specified. If the default value is not null, no nulls passed to Comparator; Otherwise, it is possible to pass nulls to Comparator.

      Type Parameters:
      O1 - the new order type
      Parameters:
      orderComparator - the Comparator to sort listeners by the specified orders
      defaultOrder - the default order that is used when the order is not specified
      Returns:
      the new EventServiceProvider.Factory

      Sets the Executor.
      Parameters:
      executor - the Executor to create AsyncEventCaller
